text: The Special Assessment shall terminate on the earlier of:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-252, see notes following ยง 47-895.01.

DC CODE ยง 47-895.05

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: At the end of the fiscal year when all the bonds are paid for and are no longer outstanding pursuant to their terms; provided, that any delinquent Special Assessments and related penalties and interest shall remain due until fully paid.

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Real Property Assessment and Tax. (Refs & Annos)
